name: oneup/flysystem-bundle
description: Integrates Flysystem filesystem abstraction library to your Symfony2 project.

suggest.league/flysystem-aws-s3-v2: Use S3 storage with AWS SDK v2
suggest.league/flysystem-aws-s3-v3: Use S3 storage with AWS SDK v3
suggest.league/flysystem-cached-adapter: Flysystem adapter decorator for metadata caching
suggest.league/flysystem-gridfs: Allows you to use GridFS adapter
suggest.league/flysystem-rackspace: Allows you to use Rackspace Cloud Files
suggest.league/flysystem-sftp: Allows SFTP server storage via phpseclib
suggest.league/flysystem-webdav: Allows you to use WebDAV storage
suggest.league/flysystem-ziparchive: Allows you to use ZipArchive adapter
suggest.league/flysystem-replicate-adapter: Allows you to use the Replicate adapter from Flysystem
suggest.twistor/flysystem-stream-wrapper: Allows you to use stream wrapper
suggest.litipk/flysystem-fallback-adapter: Allows you to use a fallback filesystem
suggest.jenko/flysystem-gaufrette: Allows you to use gaufrette adapter
suggest.superbalist/flysystem-google-storage: Allows you to use Google Cloud Storage buckets
